properties.entry: SELECT A.MEMO_NO , A.MEMO_WRITER , A.MEMO_CONTENT , A.MEMO_SCOPE , B.PROFILE_PIC , TO_CHAR(A.MEMO_CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') "MEMO_CREATE_DATE" , B.NICKNAME FROM MEMO A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMO_WRITER=B.MEM_NO) WHERE A.MEMO_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMO_DATE = ? AND A.MEMO_OWNER = ? ORDER BY A.MEMO_CREATE_DATE DESC
INSERT INTO MEMO ( MEMO_NO , MEMO_OWNER , MEMO_WRITER , MEMO_CONTENT , MEMO_DATE , MEMO_SCOPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEMO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )

SELECT A.MEMO_NO , A.MEMO_WRITER , A.MEMO_CONTENT , A.MEMO_SCOPE , B.PROFILE_PIC , TO_CHAR(A.MEMO_CREATE_DATE, 'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') "MEMO_CREATE_DATE" , B.NICKNAME FROM MEMO A JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.MEMO_WRITER = B.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN FRIEND C ON (A.MEMO_OWNER = C.RECEIVER_NO) WHERE A.MEMO_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMO_DATE = ? AND A.MEMO_OWNER = ? AND ( A.MEMO_SCOPE = 'P' OR ( A.MEMO_SCOPE = 'F' AND C.FRIEND_LEVEL IN ('A', 'B', 'C', 'D') AND C.SENDER_NO = ? ) ) ORDER BY A.MEMO_CREATE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(MEMO_NO) FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_OWNER = ? AND MEMO_DATE = ?
